data.persona: I am tired of these dead end jobs.  I am no half-baked mage.  I am Karest the Great!  I have a staff of purest gold and I know how to use it.  Yet here I am with these no-talent mages.
data.description:
You are in the Within the walls of the city.
The Tower stands tall, built of the best stone with a number of odd runes that only the local mages truly know how to read. Despite age the stones do not crumble, and stand ever vigilante as a watch station for the city.
There's a rune here.
The goblin is here.

You are carrying a hymn book and a book, wearing a Ring and a patch, and wielding a staff.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the goblin
data.mid_motivation: I want to show off my kill to the city and king
data.long_motivation: I want the king to see my value and promote me to a high class mage

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put goblin's body in display in the city

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go king's castle to speak with him

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: go home, now appointed as high mage
